name: Danmaku Things
description:
You're no supernatural teen girl, but you have a mean pencil throwing arm.
Dodge bullets.. a lot of bullets.. at least 500 of them.. and drive the monster out of your school. 

Controls
WASD to move / highlight menu items
F to flip desks / select menu item
Shift to move slower and see your hitbox
Mouse to aim and Click to shoot
Esc to pause

--- WIP ---
If menu buttons are not appearing try refreshing the page
